title: Fix the FPS drop FFS!
body: The game is unplayable even when you close the client. I have an alienware gaming laptop so it isn't my system.

replies.body:
Those fps drops are most likely not being caused by bad hardware, but more likely due to some kind of iffy software interaction with league. It could be some kind of bad driver interaction, or even possibly some corrupted game files. 

Let's go through each step in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just to make sure we cover the most common causes. Hit me back up if you have any questions.
Gone through all of the guide step by step and it is still happening sadly. Should I consider a reinstall although I do think it is the patch?

You could go ahead and grab out [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the Repatch/Reinstall options picked to make it easier if you choose to try that route, or you could just hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys can help troubleshoot a little more!
